meanings.definition: In a way that can be read easily.
meanings.sent1: She wrote her name legibly on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were printed legibly for everyone to understand.
meanings.sent3: The detective's handwriting was so legibly written that even the suspects could read it.
meanings.sent4: The sign was legibly displayed, guiding the lost travelers to the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's notes were always legibly written on the board, making it easy for the students to follow along.

meanings.definition: In a clear and readable manner.
meanings.sent1: The menu at the restaurant was legibly written in large letters.
meanings.sent2: The important information was presented legibly in the report.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to leave a legibly written note for its owner using its paw prints.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone legibly in the dark night sky, guiding the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The map was legibly drawn, showing all the landmarks clearly for the tourists to follow.
